metadata.dc:author: García, M
Torras, A
Campistol, J M
Abad, C
metadata.dc:description: A case of PTFE straight prosthesis in arm, causing an ipsilateral subclavian vein thrombosis, is presented. An original method of treatment (by-pass to internal jugular) allowed to save the vascular access for hemodialysis.
metadata.dc:title: By-pass a la yugular interna. Método original de salvar las prótesis vasculares para hemodiálisis disfuncionantes en el brazo.
[A by-pass to the internal jugular. An original method to salvage a dysfunctional vascular prosthesis in the arm for hemodialysis].
